Action.author: dongming
Action.body: PTE can generate the payload to be used for any transactions. Each thread can have its own payload. Is there any specification of the payload? Or can you give an example of the fixed payload that PTE can generate before sending any invoke?

Action.author: dongming
Action.body: Add a new key, payLoadType, in ccOpt in user input json to indicate the payload type. Two payLoadType are supported: fixed and random. For random, the payload will be the same as it is today. For fixed, then the payload size will have the same string of length payLoadMin for all transactions in the same process.
